summary: A talented but poor minstrel is forced to wander throughout the world because of impossibility to be with his true love - a rich merchant's daughter.
cast: Yuri Mgoyan|Sofiko Chiaureli|Ramaz Chkhikvadze|Konstantin Stepankov|Baia Dvalishvili|Veronique Matonidze|David Dovlatian|Levan Natroshvili|Slava Stepanian|Nodar Dugladze|Dodo Abashidze
director: Directors: Sergei Parajanov, Dodo Abashidze (co-director) (as David Abashidze)
title: Ashik-Kerib
